Internal Communication.problem: Write a team update email after a project milestone
Internal Communication.prompt: Write an internal email summarizing the recent milestone for [Project Name], including key accomplishments, next steps, and appreciation for the team.

Internal Communication.problem: Announce a new hire to the team
Internal Communication.prompt: Compose a friendly email to introduce [New Hire Name], their role as [Job Title], and a short background.

Cold Outreach.problem: Reach out to a potential partner company
Cold Outreach.prompt: Generate a cold outreach email introducing [Your Company], highlighting shared goals with [Partner Company], and suggesting a meeting.

Social Media Posts.prompt: Write a short, engaging tweet announcing the launch of [Product Name], with a call to action.
